name: Zettai Muteki Raijin-Oh
overview: Zettai Muteki Raijin-Oh is an Action game, published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1991. Gameplay involves going one-on-one against an alien critter with the Raijinou (or the robots that form it), each with their own weapon and health bar. Can also combine to form the titular robot.
